messages.subject: 10 year old unschooler(girl) looking for unschooler friend
messages.msgSnippet: Hi this is Kimberly, My 10 year old daughter Dominique is in search of unschooler to email. We presently do not personally know any unschoolers and she would
messages.messageBody:
Hi this is Kimberly, My 10 year old daughter Dominique is in search
of unschooler to email. We presently do not personally know any
unschoolers and she would enjoy the friendship of someone who lives
her lifestlye. She adores unschooling and would like some friends
with that common thread. She says she sometimes feels like our family
is the only unschooloing family in the universe!!!! If anyone is
interested her email address is: Princess1st319@... THANKS
ALOT!!!!! KImberly
